title: ARTI: Detecting and Routing Reasoning Types from Embedding Geometry
description: We show that different reasoning types leave distinct geometric signatures in transformer embedding spaces, detectable by a lightweight classifier with only 20K parameters. ARTI classifies 10 reasoning types at 84.2% accuracy (8.4x chance). ARTI-routed scoring achieves StrategyQA 81.0% (+32.6pp). Three-experiment falsification chain proves frozen encoder is structurally necessary. GCMC validation: RÂ² = 0.678.
notes: Part of a broader research arc on the geometry of machine reasoning. Builds on Papers 11 (Structural Semantic Superposition) and 12 (CO-FRN).
